name: You're never alone In The Darkness
name_original: You're never alone In The Darkness
description:
[I highly recommended to play on headphones]


You're never alone In The Darkness is a unique horror experience. 
In this game 90% of the time you will be able to access only one of your senses... your sense of hearing. Using it you will navigate through the place from your nightmares...      
Can you survive it? Try for yourself!
